response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds significant value to me, but recognizing its potential worth to you, I am prepared to consider offers. Given its immense value to you, I propose a price that reflects its true worth while ensuring a fair transaction for both parties. I kindly invite you to consider an offer of $1,200,000 for this product. I believe this price strikes a balance between acknowledging its value to you and maintaining a reasonable profit for me. Should you have any questions or wish to discuss further, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
